name: Mini Chocolate Chip Pumpkin Muffins
author: Jen
summary: Super simple, moist, and yummy with only 3 ingredients plus cooking spray! I use Duncan Hines Signature® spice cake mix and Libby's® 100% pure pumpkin. Be sure to use mini chocolate chips as the regular size overpower the small muffins. Enjoy!
ingredients: 1 (18.25 ounce) package spice cake mix (such as Duncan Hines® Signature)
1 (15 ounce) can pure pumpkin (such as Libby's®)
½ (12 ounce) package miniature chocolate chips
directions: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
Spray 12 nonstick muffin cups with cooking spray
Mix spice cake with pumpkin in a bowl with an electric mixer until batter is thick and smooth; stir miniature chocolate chips into batter
Scoop batter into prepared muffin cups
Bake in the preheated oven until lightly golden brown and a toothpick inserted into the center of a muffin comes out clean or with moist crumbs, about 15 minutes
Let muffins rest for about 3 minutes to set before removing from pan to finish cooling on a wire rack
